hypotheses.H1: Indice alea = max(vent/80, neige/20) + 0.2 si temp<-15C
hypotheses.H2: Remontee reduite si indice >= seuil_impact, fermee si >= seuil_fermeture
hypotheses.H3: Activite pleine si accessibilite >= 0.7, arret si <= 0.4
hypotheses.H5: CA pic saison (fevrier) : hypotheses fictives a calibrer
